name: Gunslingin' Bastards!
description:
---------------------------------------------------------------

August 15th 1875,

It has been 500 years when Tim Zumor has been on a mission.

His mission is to whipe out, the Volorum family. In the Hotline Miami Wild Western game goal is to find and kill the family, who are responsable for the death of Tim's Half-Brothers death.

But the Volorum family have a secret curse for themselves to carry. What is that curse? Will Tim discover what the curse is?

---------------------------------------------------------------

Crew:

Programmer: Dirk ten Have

Idea by: Dirk ten Have

Music by: Steve Oxon

Game Engine Used: Unity Engine 2020 ver.

Assets Used from: RPG Maker MV

Licences: RPG Maker MV

Photoshop

---------------------------------------------------------------

Controls:

WASD: Move Character

Moving the mouse: Look around

Left Mouse button: Shoot

R: Reload gun

Escape: Pause

---------------------------------------------------------------
